name: Elemental Guns n Magic
description:
Choose a character and team up with an ally in order to defend your tower from your rivals!

  • Aigua: Water powers. Casts a bubble. Weak to Earth and strong to Fire.
  • Foc: Fire powers. Casts a flame circle. Weak to Water and strong to Earth.
  • Planta: Earth powers. Casts a vine. Weak to Fire and Strong to Water.
  • Aire: Healing wind powers. Heals himself and his ally in a range. No weaknesses or strengths.

Controls:

  • A: Left
  • D: Right
  • W: Jump
  • Left click: Shoot.
  • Right click: Special Attack (when magic gauge is full)

Enemies can't be killed but will stop for a while when damaged.

When your life reaches zero you will return to your tower.

Game ends when a tower is destroyed.

A game made by Miquel, Lyhdyr, Sergi and Pere for Multiplayer Systems (2022-2023, Universitat de Girona).

Original sprites by Lyhdyr and Sergi.
